destinations.name: Bali
destinations.description: Island paradise known for stunning beaches, ancient temples, lush rice terraces, and vibrant culture. Perfect blend of relaxation and adventure.
safety_tips: Beware of monkeys at tourist sites
Use registered taxis or ride-hailing apps

attractions.name: Tanah Lot Temple
attractions.description: Iconic sea temple perched on a rock formation, best visited at sunset

attractions.name: Tegallalang Rice Terraces
attractions.description: Stunning emerald-green rice paddies with traditional Subak irrigation system

attractions.name: Ubud Monkey Forest
attractions.description: Sacred sanctuary home to over 700 long-tailed macaques

attractions.name: Uluwatu Temple
attractions.description: Clifftop temple with breathtaking ocean views and Kecak dance performances

destinations.name: Bangkok
destinations.description: Vibrant capital city blending ancient temples, bustling street markets, modern malls, and world-class street food.
safety_tips: Use metered taxis or Grab app
Beware of gem scams near temples

attractions.name: Grand Palace
attractions.description: Magnificent royal complex with ornate buildings and the revered Emerald Buddha

attractions.name: Wat Pho
attractions.description: Home to the famous 46-meter reclining Buddha covered in gold leaf

attractions.name: Chatuchak Weekend Market
attractions.description: Massive market with over 15,000 stalls selling everything imaginable

destinations.name: Singapore
destinations.description: Futuristic city-state combining diverse cultures, world-class dining, architectural marvels, and efficient public transport.
safety_tips: Tap water is safe to drink

attractions.name: Gardens by the Bay
attractions.description: Futuristic garden with iconic Supertree Grove and climate-controlled domes

attractions.name: Marina Bay Sands SkyPark
attractions.description: Rooftop observation deck with panoramic city views

attractions.name: Sentosa Island
attractions.description: Resort island with beaches, Universal Studios, and entertainment

destinations.name: Tokyo
destinations.description: Electric metropolis where ancient traditions meet cutting-edge technology, offering world-class cuisine, shopping, and culture.

attractions.name: Senso-ji Temple
attractions.description: Tokyo's oldest temple in historic Asakusa district

attractions.name: Shibuya Crossing
attractions.description: World's busiest pedestrian crossing, iconic Tokyo experience

attractions.name: Meiji Shrine
attractions.description: Peaceful Shinto shrine surrounded by dense forest in central Tokyo

destinations.name: Seoul
destinations.description: Dynamic capital blending K-pop culture, historic palaces, cutting-edge technology, and incredible food scene.
safety_tips: Don't write names in red ink

attractions.name: Gyeongbokgung Palace
attractions.description: Largest and most iconic of Seoul's five grand palaces

attractions.name: N Seoul Tower
attractions.description: Iconic tower on Namsan Mountain with panoramic city views

attractions.name: Bukchon Hanok Village
attractions.description: Traditional Korean houses (hanok) preserved in historic neighborhood

destinations.name: Kuala Lumpur
destinations.description: Multicultural capital featuring iconic Petronas Towers, diverse cuisine, vibrant markets, and mix of modern and colonial architecture.
safety_tips: Beware of pickpockets in crowded areas
Tap water not recommended for drinking

attractions.name: Petronas Twin Towers
attractions.description: Iconic 88-story twin skyscrapers with skybridge observation deck

attractions.name: Batu Caves
attractions.description: Hindu temple complex in limestone caves with 272-step colorful staircase

attractions.name: Central Market
attractions.description: Historic market showcasing Malaysian handicrafts and street food

destinations.name: Paris
destinations.description: City of Light renowned for art, fashion, gastronomy, and iconic landmarks like the Eiffel Tower and Louvre.
safety_tips: Watch for pickpockets near tourist sites
Keep belongings close in crowded areas

attractions.name: Eiffel Tower
attractions.description: Iconic iron lattice tower offering stunning city views

attractions.name: Louvre Museum
attractions.description: World's largest art museum, home to Mona Lisa and thousands of masterpieces

attractions.name: Notre-Dame Cathedral
attractions.description: Medieval Gothic cathedral on Île de la Cité (exterior viewing)

destinations.name: New York
destinations.description: The city that never sleeps, offering world-class museums, Broadway shows, diverse neighborhoods, and iconic skyline.
safety_tips: Stay aware in crowded subway stations
Use official yellow cabs or rideshares

attractions.name: Statue of Liberty
attractions.description: Iconic symbol of freedom on Liberty Island with museum and observation deck

attractions.name: Central Park
attractions.description: Massive urban park offering green spaces, lakes, and cultural attractions

attractions.name: Times Square
attractions.description: Bright lights and bustling energy in the heart of Manhattan

destinations.name: Barcelona
destinations.description: Catalan capital famous for Gaudí's architecture, Mediterranean beaches, vibrant nightlife, and rich culinary traditions.
safety_tips: Watch for pickpockets on Las Ramblas

attractions.name: Sagrada Familia
attractions.description: Gaudí's unfinished masterpiece basilica with stunning architecture

attractions.name: Park Güell
attractions.description: Whimsical park designed by Gaudí with colorful mosaics and city views

attractions.name: La Rambla
attractions.description: Famous tree-lined pedestrian street with street performers and cafes

destinations.name: Sydney
destinations.description: Harbor city known for Opera House, stunning beaches, diverse culture, and laid-back outdoor lifestyle.

attractions.name: Sydney Opera House
attractions.description: Iconic sail-shaped performing arts center on Sydney Harbour

attractions.name: Bondi Beach
attractions.description: Famous golden sand beach perfect for swimming and surfing

attractions.name: Taronga Zoo
attractions.description: Harbourside zoo with native Australian animals and city views
